entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:32 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 3:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon then changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
